name: Macbeth's Fate
description: "Macbeth's Fate" is an experiment if and how games can work as an adaptation of literature, that does not simply tell the story arc, but focus on the things between the lines instead. In this case I deal with Shakespeare's play "Macbeth" and thereby focus on the illustration of the prophecy of the three witches. This game shall mediate the experience of how hard it is to resist temptation.
